001package com.github.sormuras.bach.command;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Collection;
005import java.util.List;
006
007/** An option that holds zero or more additional command-line arguments. */
008public record AdditionalArgumentsOption(List<String> values) implements Option {
009  public static AdditionalArgumentsOption empty() {
010    return new AdditionalArgumentsOption(List.of());
011  }
012
013  public AdditionalArgumentsOption add(Object value) {
014    var values = new ArrayList<>(this.values);
015    values.add(value.toString());
016    return new AdditionalArgumentsOption(List.copyOf(values));
017  }
018
019  public AdditionalArgumentsOption add(String option, Object value, Object... more) {
020    var values = new ArrayList<>(this.values);
021    values.add(option);
022    values.add(value.toString());
023    for (var additional : more) values.add(additional.toString());
024    return new AdditionalArgumentsOption(List.copyOf(values));
025  }
026
027  public AdditionalArgumentsOption addAll(Object... arguments) {
028    if (arguments.length == 0) return this;
029    if (arguments.length == 1) return add(arguments[0]);
030    return addAll(List.of(arguments));
031  }
032
033  public AdditionalArgumentsOption addAll(Collection<?> arguments) {
034    if (arguments.isEmpty()) return this;
035    var values = new ArrayList<>(this.values);
036    arguments.stream().map(Object::toString).forEach(values::add);
037    return new AdditionalArgumentsOption(List.copyOf(values));
038  }
039}
